summary: CONSUMER MOVED THE DRIVER'S SEAT TO ITS FULLY FORWARD POSITION IN ORDER TO RETRIEVE A DROPPED ITEM.  THE SEAT BECAME STUCK IN THAT POSITION AND COULD  NOT BE MOVED.   *AK   THIS WAS AN UNSAFE POSITION FOR THE SEAT TO BE IN ACCORDING TO THE OWNERS MANUAL, AS IT ALLOWED THE POSSIBILITY OF INJURY IF THE AIR BAG DEPLOYED.   *SCC  *JB
